titleStmt.title: A sermon preached on the 16th day of April 1696 in the parish church of St. Michael in New-Malton, being the thanksgiving day appointed for the discovery and disappointment of the horrible and barbarous conspiracy &c. / by William Perse.
titleStmt.author: Perse, William, 1640 or 41-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
